
=head1 NAME

organization

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 identifier (character varying) - 
 name (character varying) - 
 url (character varying) - 
 country (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                  Table "gcis_metadata.organization"
    Column   |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 ------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  identifier | character varying | not null  | extended | 
  name       | character varying |           | extended | 
  url        | character varying |           | extended | 
  country    | character varying |           | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "organization_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "contributor" CONSTRAINT "contributor_organization_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (organization) REFERENCES organization(identifier)
     TABLE "dataset_organization" CONSTRAINT "dataset_organization_organization_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (organization) REFERENCES organization(identifier)
     TABLE "organization_type_map" CONSTRAINT "organization_type_map_organization_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (organization) REFERENCES organization(identifier) ON DELETE CASCADE
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON organization FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON organization FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
